            <p>
                
    
    <!-- Container -->
    <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="5" width="92%">
	<tbody>
		<tr valign="top">
			<td>
				<h2>
					<span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="color: rgb(178, 34, 34);">STARTERS &amp; ALTERNATORS</span></span></h2>
				<p>
					<span style="font-size:11px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">We provide alternators, starters, and electric and hybrid motors for the heavy-duty and light-duty original equipment markets, as well as new and remanufactured alternators and starters to the aftermarket.<br />
					<a href="/AboutOverview.aspx">Learn more</a></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<img alt="" src="/getattachment/spacer-blue.gif.aspx?height=120" style="width: 1px; height: 150px;" /></td>
			<td>
				<h2>
					<span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="color: rgb(178, 34, 34);">ELECTRIC &amp; HYBRID MOTORS</span></span></h2>
				<p>
					<span style="font-size:11px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Remy is a leader in the electric motor market. Our superior engineering and design have resulted in motor solutions that provide higher output and better performance and are scalable for multiple applications.<br />
					<a href="/Hybrid.aspx">Learn more</a></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<img alt="" src="/getattachment/spacer-blue.gif.aspx?height=120" style="width: 1px; height: 150px;" /></td>
			<td>
				<h2>
					<span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="color: rgb(178, 34, 34);">OEM &amp; AFTERMARKET</span></span></h2>
				<p>
					<span style="font-size:11px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">As the only major rotating electrics provider with a presence in both the OE and aftermarket segments, every part is engineered to combine quality and durability with powertrain efficiency.<br />
					<a href="/About.aspx">Learn more</a></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<br />


            </p>
